summary: This document is an email chain from April 2021 regarding the creation of review batches for an Epstein search warrant database. The emails discuss running searches for specific email addresses (gmax@com, gmaxl@com, aace@com) and organizing responsive materials into batches of approximately 500 documents each.

events.title: Initial Request for Epstein Database Batches
events.description: An initial email request to create review batches from the Epstein search warrant database, specifically for materials hitting on the terms 'gmax' and 'gmaxl'.

events.title: Follow-up Search Request
events.description: A follow-up email requesting a search of the Epstein SW database for any email hitting on specific email addresses (gmax@com, gmaxl@com, aace@com) and creation of batches of 500 documents each.

events.title: Completion of Batch Creation
events.description: Email correspondence indicating the requested search and batch creation for the Epstein SW database has been completed and the batches are available for review.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain concerning the review of an Epstein search warrant (SW) database.
Specific search terms requested include email addresses: gmax@com, gmaxl@com, and aace@com.
The responsive materials were to be organized into batches of approximately 500 documents each for review.
The correspondence indicates the search and batch creation process was completed by April 27, 2021.
The document shows ongoing investigative work related to the Epstein case in early 2021, focusing on electronic records.
